author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-GlaxoSmithKline Receives US Approval Of Arnuity Ellipta For Use In Children From 5 Years Old Who Suffer From Asthma
text:
May 21 (Reuters) - GlaxoSmithKline PLC:
* GSK RECEIVES US APPROVAL OF ARNUITY ELLIPTA FOR USE IN CHILDREN FROM 5 YEARS OLD WHO SUFFER FROM ASTHMA
* RECEIVED APPROVAL FROM US FDA FOR USE OF ARNUITY ELLIPTA (FLUTICASONE FUROATE) FOR MAINTENANCE TREATMENT OF ASTHMA IN CHILDREN FROM AS YOUNG AS 5 YEARS Source: bit.ly/2KIfvII Further company coverage: (Reuters.Briefs@thomsonreuters.com)
